definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
grain crops other than rice and wheat
granary/barn/fig. bread basket (of fertile agricultural land)
coupons for food or grain used in a PRC economic program c. 1955-1993
commodity grain (grain produced as a commodity rather than for self-sufficiency)

sentences.english: Running our of grain, the army had to live on wild fruit and tree bark.
sentences.chinese: 部隊斷了糧，只能靠野果和樹皮充飢。

sentences.english: Study on the optimum dietary protein level for laying Shao Ducks.
sentences.chinese: 紹鴨產蛋期日糧蛋白質水平的研究。

sentences.english: 50But here is the bread that comes down from heaven, which a man may eat and not die.
sentences.chinese: 這是從天上降下來的糧，叫人吃了就不死。

sentences.english: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
sentences.chinese: 我們投降埃及人和亞述人，爲要得糧喫飽。

sentences.english: Helping Africa is a good thing but, then, so is selling dog food.
sentences.chinese: 幫助非洲人是一件好事，但賣狗糧也是。

sentences.english: And Joseph's ten brethren went down to buy corn in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 於是，約瑟的十個哥哥都下埃及糴糧去了。

sentences.english: Moreover, the high phosphorus diets appeared the tendency of epiphyseal plate thickness and bone cortical thickness decreasing.
sentences.chinese: 高磷日糧呈現降低生長板和骨皮質厚度的趨勢。

sentences.english: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.
sentences.chinese: 因爲神的糧，就是那從天上降下來賜生命給世界的。

sentences.english: And they said, From the land of Canaan to buy food.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，我們從迦南地來糴糧。

sentences.english: Dog grain that Shenyang pet shop sells. Where does the pet articles for use toy wait to replenish stock?
sentences.chinese: 瀋陽寵物店賣的狗糧。寵物用品玩具等在哪進貨？

sentences.english: Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing i.
sentences.chinese: 我已使你成爲有快齒打糧的新器具。

sentences.english: Give me your credit cards. You're living beyond your means.
sentences.chinese: 把你的信用卡給我，你花錢總是寅喫卯糧的。

sentences.english: The laying hens were fed with diet supplied high-iron and high-iodine for 8 weeks and the observations were made on egg quality.
sentences.chinese: 用高鐵高碘日糧飼餵產蛋母雞，觀察對蛋品質的影響。

sentences.english: Not recognized as an essential nutrient by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles.
sentences.chinese: 未確認爲養分狀況必需的營養素由AAFCO犬糧。

sentences.english: No matter how good the advertising, it's not a success if the dogs don't eat the dog food.
sentences.chinese: 不管廣告做得多好，如果狗不喫狗糧，就不算成功。

sentences.english: Dog food made up a lot of trouble?

definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to choose/to pick/to sort out/to pick up
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
